questions.question: When Lan was small, she was encouraged to speak out her opinions. That's why she's so .... now.
He tries to keep himself ...., so he reads most of the local newspapers and also gets a lot of information.
Whenever she wants something, she tries her best to get it and doesn't let anyone discourage her. She's so .... .
Before making a .... he often considers different options.
Her ...... makes her a good leader.
Everyone should act ...... in order to protect our environment.
....... is necessary for a good friendship.
You need to have a number of life skills to become ......
Denis received a letter from his mother. He was happy.

choices.answer: Denis was happy to receive a letter from his mother.
Denis is happy to receive a letter from his mother.
Denis was happy for receiving a letter from his mother.
Denis was happy when receive a letter from his mother.

questions.question: Ann passed the exam. She was so lucky.

choices.answer: Ann was so lucky for passing the exam.
Ann was too lucky to pass the exam.
Ann was so lucky when pass the exam.
Ann was so lucky to pass the exam.

questions.question: You should learn how to cope with loneliness. It's important.

choices.answer: It's important to learn how to cope with loneliness.
It's important for learning how to cope with loneliness.
It's important to learn how to cope to loneliness.
It's too important for you to learn how to cope with loneliness.

questions.question: We can't guess what will happen. It's difficult.

choices.answer: It's too difficult for us to guess what will happen.
It's difficult to guess what will happen.
It's difficult about guess what will happen.
It's difficult of guessing what will happen.

questions.question: He tried hard to overcome any difficulties by himself. (effort)

choices.answer: He made an effort of overcoming any difficulties by himself.
He made an effort to overcome any difficulties by himself.
He made an effort when overcome any difficulties by himself.
He makes an effort to overcome any difficulties by himself.

questions.question: Tom tried hard to persuade his parents to allow him to join the club, but he failed.

choices.answer: Tom's attempt to persuade his parents to allow him to join the club failed.
Tom's attempt persuade his parents to allow him to join the club failed.
Tom's attempt of persuade his parents to allow him to join the club failed.
Tom's attempt to persuade his parents allow him to join the club failed.
